data.name: Scrolls of Sengoku Dynasty
data.detailed_description:
Sengoku Dynasty

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1702010/Sengoku_Dynasty/


About the Software

Welcome to feudal Japan!

To pass the time until the release of Sengoku Dynasty, the scrolls will tell you everything you need to know before you start your fight for your legacy in the eagerly anticipated mixture of roleplaying game, city-builder and survival set against the stunning backdrop of Japan’s Sengoku era.

Exclusive information straight from the development team will give you a chance to go behind-the-scenes. Plus: The interactive magazine is packed with meticulously researched articles, giving you an insight into Japan’s history, myths and facts and how it is woven into every fabric of the game world. As owner of all eight issues you will receive a loyalty bonus of 20% rebate on your purchase of Sengoku Dynasty (*). The scrolls are more than just a magazine. They are an experience!

  • The official interactive magazine
  • Development insights and background stories
  • Glossary with hundreds of terms and explanations
  • Developed in collaboration with Japanologists
  • Rebate offer on the purchase of Sengoku Dynasty on Steam (*)
  • First issue free-of-charge

(*) available for a limited time period after launch

data.short_description: You can’t get any closer to Sengoku Dynasty. With the scrolls you’ll receive first-hand development infos as well as exciting background stories. Eight issues tell you everything you need to know about Sengoku Dynasty.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
